Hi I'm
ARNOLD M. MONTICALVO
components.buttons: LEARN MORE ABOUT ME

components.title: CAREER PROFILE
components.text:
• More than ten years of technical expertise in various IT fields. • Advanced knowledge in system administration and network policies. • Extensive knowledge in software development, hardware maintenance and troubleshooting. • Well verse in corporate IT working environment and international standards. • Major strength includes the ability to work with diverse and multicultural groups. • Proactive team player with excellent interpersonal relationship, and communication skills. • Proven track record of facilitating changes within a professional result oriented time bound manner.


If Sad=True then

   Sad=False

   TrustInGod(); ThinkPositive(); BeAwesome();

End If
components.button: DOWNLOAD RESUME

items.text:
IT Manager

FSM Social Security Administration

Headquarter, Kolonia, Pohnpei FM

Website: FSM Social Security Administration

Department: IT Department

March 08, 2015 - present


Duties and Responsibilities:


Hardware and Networking

Maintain and operate computer systems, network, switches and routers. Oversee Installation, support and maintain servers, laptop and desktop computer systems. Plan for and respond to service outages and other problems. Responsible for overall security and the upkeep of firewalls and intrusion detection systems.

Perform and verify back-ups of system data and other server files. Suggest and improve on all IT procedures. Quickly diagnose hardware and networking problems at HQ and in branch offices.


Software

Oversee all computer software requirements and installation including the installation of upgrades, and all operational tasks, including:

• All employer and benefit functions

• Maintaining usernames and permissions

• Check printing procedures

• Importing and Exporting data from branches

• Importing and Exporting data to Headquarters


Management

• Train computer staff in all aspects of FSM Social Security Administration computer operations, so that adequate personnel back up is always available;

• Keep in touch w/FSM Social Security contract programmers on a regular basis and keep the Administrator informed of any changes or additions required to FSM Social Security Administration computer hardware or software;

• Ensures monthly, quarterly and year-end data processing are done on a timely manner;

• Periodically test audit trails to ensure no security violations have occurred in the master files;

• Perform other duties as assigned in job description



IT/Software Developer

MZ and Parnters Consultancy

Address : P.O. Box 5785 Doha Qatar

Website : http://www.mzandpartners.com

Department: IT Department

Sept 24, 2010 - Present


Duties and Responsibilities:


• Maintaining company’s IT infrastructure

• Monitoring and ensuring company’s software and network availability

• Supervising Server operation and ensuring optimal performance

• Manage Server and Workstation software deployment using Microsoft SCCM

• Developing software to aid in CAD operation and process

• Provide electronically or hardcopy IT information and documentation to users

• Perform Intervention or refer to external assistance, if necessary

• Developing application to streamline daily task

Systems Engineer

Al-Othaim Markets Company

P.O. Box 41700 Riyadh, KSA

Website : Al Othaim Markets -KSA

Department: IT infrastructure Department

November 30, 2008 to January 31, 2010


Duties and Responsibilities:


• Providing first line of support on all branches regarding system and application issues

• Collaborate with other IT Team regarding system issues and anomalies

• Monitoring and ensuring company’s system and network integrity

• Supervising the installation of network connections and devices for new projects such as new markets

• Responsible in monitoring branch daily connection uploads and batch processing

• Collaborate with other IT Team member regarding system development



MIS/Application Developer

Essilor Manufacturing Philippines Inc.

SFB No. 10 FAB Mariveles, Bataan

Website : Essilor Manufacturing Philippines Inc

Department: MIS/Logistics Department

July 14, 1999 – October 2008


Duties and Responsibilities:


Software

• Installation of Software according to the company’s standard and user’s requirement

• Provide software support and ISO documentation for every revision

• Analyze end users requests for software development and modification

• Develop software according to the company’s standard and user requirement


Hardware

• Select Hardware and Networking needs according to the companies’ standard requirement

• Identify needs for upgrading and renew of Hardware

• Monitor and test hardware’s working integrity and setup

• Provide technical support and repair if possible

• Provide preventive maintenance of all IT hardware


Management

• Provide electronically or hardcopy IT information and documentation to users

• Documentation and registration of new hardware

• Perform Intervention or refer to external assistance, if necessary

“At first view, looks like a nice innovative tool, i like the great focus and time that was given to the responsive design, i also like the simple and clear drag and drop features. Give me more control over the object's properties and ill be using this tool for more serious projects. Regards.”

items.text:
System Administration

• Active Directory, Domain Management and Securities

• Server, Computer Management Administration

• Network Scripting and Automation

• Operating System Deployment (Unattended, Cloning, WinPE)

• Microsoft Exchange Administration.

• NAS/Tape Backup


Software Development

• Microsoft Visual Studio (ASP.NET/Visual Basic.Net/C#.net)

• Adobe Flex Builder 4.6 and Flash CS5

• Microsoft SQL and Stored Procedure/MYSQL

• Web/Mobile Application Development

• HTM/HTML5/CSS

• Macro Programming in VBA/Microsoft Office Automation

• Autodesk .NET Application Development for AutoCAD, Revit and Robot

• Relational Database Management System (SQL/Visual FoxPro/DBASE)


Productivity Software

•  Adobe Photoshop

•  Microsoft Office, Basic knowledge in Autodesk AutoCAD and Revit

Software Applications

• Microsoft Windows Operating Systems and Servers

• Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager and Microsoft ISA/TMG Server

• CA Unicenter Software Asset and Delivery

• CA Unicenter ArcServer Backup

• Microsoft Forefront Endpoint Protection/Symantec Corporate Antivirus

• Remote Control and Management Software

• VMWare Workstation/Microsoft Virtual Machine


Network Installation

•  Basic Network Installation, Cabling and troubleshooting, CISCO Routers and  Switches, Wireless devices/Access Point Remote Control Software Troubleshooting

• Knowledge in corporate (WAN/LAN) environment


Technical Support and Helpdesk/ISO Standards

•  Analyze/Repair/Document all IT related issues

•  Maintain, develop and manage current system

•  Provide immediate solution to end user

•  Knowledge and training in International Standards IS0 9001,14001,18001

“At first view, looks like a nice innovative tool, i like the great focus and time that was given to the responsive design, i also like the simple and clear drag and drop features. Give me more control over the object's properties and ill be using this tool for more serious projects. Regards.”

Migrated old HMTL website of Social Security Administration to HTML5

standard and added browsing efficiency

components.title:
EMPLOYEE
ATTENDANCE
components.text:
Intranet Web application for employee attendance and

project man power monitoring. Use for Project

forecasting and management


Developed using ASP.NET

components.title: AUTOCAD PLUGINS
components.text:
Collection of engineering and customize plugins and

software automation use in detailing and designing

structural projects.


Developed using .NET and Autodesk API
components.button: LEARN MORE

components.title:
AUTODESK REVIT
PLUGINS
components.text:
Collection of customize plugins for BIM projects.

Utilities and tools which are not available in Revit,

to help detailers in modelling.


Developed using .NET and Autodesk API
components.button: LEARN MORE

components.title:
DOCUMENT ARCHIVE
SYSTEM
components.text:
Use in archiving documents electronically based on ISO 9001

guidelines and documentations.


Developed using .NET and SQL

components.title: SITE ATTENDANCE
components.text:
Attendance use for remote site office. This software uses

Microsoft OneDrive internet service communicating data using

from site to head office.


Developed using .NET and Microsoft OneDrive
